title: Fluctuating FPS from game to game.
body: I would just like to fix my fps issue that started to frequently happen after legacy client is taken away. The fps randomly drops from game to game, with one game having 50-60 fps while another game right after having 10-14 fps. The client is closed during games so that isnt my problem. I have no problem in some games while its unplayable in other games. I would appreciate some feedback, thank you. Also, I have updated all my drivers to the latest.

replies.body: I literally dropped from ~180 to 10-20 since patch 7.5, it's ridiculous.

It almost sounds like your pc is hitting some rough spots here and there, but there's a chance it's being caused by some damaged game files too. Let's make sure to cover all of our bases by going through the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).
